docs.text: DISCLAIMER This documentation is nowhere near done. Initial setup You've finally decided that you want Juxta running your server. Splendid. Firstly, you'll have to add the bot . Setup prompt When the bot is in the server, run -setup in any channel to begin using the setup wizard. Here, you will enable, disable, and setup bot features.
